author: Naomi Powell
title: ‘Brutal education’: Inside the mad rush to make masks to battle COVID-19
description: McMaster University is just one Canadian entity mobilizing to make PPE and crucial medical devices
content: In a normal April, in a normal year, Bob Preston might be found strolling through the campus of McMaster University, or lingering in a coffee shop, working out project ideas on a pad of paper. Classes would have ended on schedule, students would be studying f… [+9167 chars]
